titles: An Abridgment of the case of the cities, corporations and market- towns of England, most humbly represented to the right honourable the Lords  spiritual and temporal in Parliament assembled.
notes: Urging the passing of a bill against hawkers and pedlars.
Reproduction of original in Guildhall Library (London, England)
keywords: Peddlers and peddling --  Law and legislation --  Great Britain.
